column1: 253411,Psychiatrist,,"Advise patients of health conditions or treatments
column3: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
column5: Analyse test results to inform diagnosis or treatment
column9: Examine patients to assess general physical condition
column11: Collect medical information from patients, family members or other medical professionals
column15: Explain medical procedures or test results to patients or family members
column23: Analyse data to determine effectiveness of treatments or therapies
column25: Prepare official health documents or records
column27: Prepare reports summarising patient diagnostic or care activities
column31: Conduct research to increase knowledge about medical issues
